checklistDescription: Items for new members of talent team.

addToSlack.description: Make sure you're added to the following slack channels: #talent , #teamtalentonly, and any team channels you will be the person-of-contact for. (#teamtalentonly can help you with this.)

learnTalent.description: Your director or buddy will walk you through the differences between 18F's Talent Team and GSA's HR.

haveDocs.description: You should have access to the Talent folder and docs on Google Drive. Ask your buddy to make sure you've been added to the proper folders and documents.

weeklyMeeting.description: Make sure you're added to the Talent Team's weekly meeting invite.

meetDirector.description: You'll meet with the director and go over your performance plan.

meetTeam.description: You'll meet each person in #teamtalentonly for a 1:1 during your first two weeks.

introLever.description: You'll receive Lever training in your second weel from Bill. He will also set up additional training with you.

reviewTock.description: Review time entry and project selection in Tock. Your buddy will help you with this.

meetTeamDirector.displayName: Meet the director of your team.
meetTeamDirector.description: Set up 1:1 with Director of team you will be Talent POC for.

setUpConcur.displayName: Set up Concur account for travel.
setUpConcur.description: Jenn Moran will help you do this.
